T02D1429:197b-1: shr'i tsakra sam ba ra s'a dha nam tattva sam gra ha n'a ma /
T02D1429:197b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub thabs de kho na nyid kyis bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1429:197b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1429:197b-5: gang gi drin gyi bde chen gnas //
T02D1429:197b-6: skad cig nyid la thob 'gyur ba //
T02D1429:197b-7: bla ma rin chen lta bu dang //
T02D1429:197b-8: rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud //
T02D1429:197b-10: sa gsum gnas la gus btud de //
T02D1429:197b-11: de nyid rin chen kun bsdus pa //
T02D1429:197b-12: sku gsum po yi cho ga bshad //
T02D1429:197b-13: dang por sngags kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1429:197b-14: dben pa'i gnas su dgos pa tshang pa can gyis gnas te /
T02D1429:197b-15: byang chub tu sems bskyed de ;
T02D1429:197b-16: sems can thams cad kyi don 'byung ba dang lha dang bla ma la /
T02D1429:197b-17: dang po dang bla na med pa'i lam la gnas
T02D1429:197b-18: pas dga' bas byang chub chen por nyal bar bya'o
T02D1429:197b-19: // de nas tho rangs kyi thun la nam mkha'i
T02D1429:197b-20: khams na gnas pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma
T02D1429:197b-21: thams cad kyi mchog gi sgra dang /
T02D1429:198a-0: @198a * // d'a ma rus bskul ba dang langs te /
T02D1429:198a-1: aom sarba b'i ra yo ge n'i n'am k'a ya
T02D1429:198a-2: w'ak tsitta pra na me na badzra band'a n'am ka
T02D1429:198a-3: ro mi zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis phyag byas te
T02D1429:198a-4: / lus bde bar gnas pa'i las byas nas /
T02D1429:198a-5: srid pa gsum po rnam par dag pa'i gnas keng
T02D1429:198a-6: rus kyi dbus su sa bcu'i rang bzhin du bsams
T02D1429:198a-7: te gnas la / rnal 'byor bsrung ba'i don du
T02D1429:198a-8: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la snyoms bar 'jug pa sngon
T02D1429:198a-9: te gnas la / du 'gro bas / phung po dang dbang po dang /
T02D1429:198a-10: khams rnams kyi nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1429:198a-11: de la gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1429:198a-12: tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-13: 'du shes kyi phung po ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1429:198a-14: 'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D1429:198a-15: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1429:198a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1429:198a-17: mig la ni gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1429:198a-18: rna ba gnyis la zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1429:198a-19: sna la ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02D1429:198a-21: lus la phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1429:198a-22: skye mched kyi bdag po la ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o //
T02D1429:198a-23: sa'i khams la ni ltung byed ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-24: chu'i khams la ni gsod byed ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-25: me'i khams la ni dgug byed ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-26: rlung gi khams la ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-27: nam mkha'i khams la ni padma'i dra ba can ma'o //
T02D1429:198a-28: de dag ni phung po dang dbang po dang khams rnam par dag pa go cha'i lha ste /
T02D1429:198a-30: he ru ka rnam par rgyal ba'i nga rgyal brtan pas /
T02D1429:198a-31: g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur snying gar bsgreng ste /
T02D1429:198a-32: g-yon se gol ngang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub phyogs su bskor zhing /
T02D1429:198a-33: aom sumbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:198a-34: aom grihna grihna hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:198a-35: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:198a-36: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'an badzra r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D1429:198a-37: ces brjod cing zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer gyi
T02D1429:198a-38: tshogs du ma spros pas bgegs rnams bskrad cing bsreg
T02D1429:198a-39: par rnam par bsams par byas la /
T02D1429:198a-41: aom me di ni badzra'i bha wa badzra bandha h'um zhes brjod pas /
T02D1429:198a-42: 'og rtse gsum pa'i bdag nyid kyi sna tshogs rdo rjer byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1429:198a-43: aom badzra pr'a ka ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1429:198a-44: aom badzra panytsa ra h'um bam h'um pi t'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1429:198a-45: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram h'um /
T02D1429:198b-0: aom badzra @198b dzva la aa na l'arka h'um h'um h'um /
T02D1429:198b-1: zhes bya ba'i sngags rnams kyis rim bzhin du rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D1429:198b-5: me ri 'bar ba'i mthar thug par bsams te /
T02D1429:198b-6: las thams cad pa'i khro bor spros nas bgegs kyi dbang po rnams bkug ste /
T02D1429:198b-7: aom gha: gha: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'an phat /
T02D1429:198b-8: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02D1429:198b-9: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1429:198b-10: sarba bighnam k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la
T02D1429:198b-11: ya h'um phat ces bya ba'i sngags kyis phur bus
T02D1429:198b-12: gdab bo // aom badzra mudga ra /
T02D1429:198b-13: badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat
T02D1429:198b-14: ces bya bas phur bu rnams brdung ngo de nas
T02D1429:198b-15: rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1429:198b-16: de'i steng du h'um sngon po 'od zer sna tshogs
T02D1429:198b-18: de'i 'od kyis mdun gyi bar snang la bla ma
T02D1429:198b-19: dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i tshogs bltas te phyag
T02D1429:198b-20: byas nas / phyi dang gsang ba dang /
T02D1429:198b-21: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1429:198b-22: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1429:198b-23: thog ma med dus 'khor ba na //
T02D1429:198b-24: chags sogs rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1429:198b-25: sdig bgyis mgon po'i spyan snga du //
T02D1429:198b-26: ma lus so sor bshags par bgyi //
T02D1429:198b-27: rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis //
T02D1429:198b-28: nyer bsdus 'gro ba thams cad kyi ;
T02D1429:198b-29: / bsod nams tshogs ni ma lus la //
T02D1429:198b-30: rtag par bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02D1429:198b-31: rdo rje'i ye shes thugs chud nas //
T02D1429:198b-32: shing dbang drung na bzhugs gyur pa'i //
T02D1429:198b-33: 'gro la nyer brtses thub dbang rnams //
T02D1429:198b-34: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol //
T02D1429:198b-35: rgyal ba'i mdzad pa rdzogs gyur te //
T02D1429:198b-36: mgon po dbyings su gshegs bzhed la //
T02D1429:198b-37: sems can sdug bsngal bral bar du //
T02D1429:198b-39: bdag ni thub dbang ma gyur bar //
T02D1429:198b-40: sangs rgyas sngags sogs chos rnams dang //
T02D1429:198b-41: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bcas //
T02D1429:198b-42: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1429:198b-43: rnal 'byor lam la gnas bgyi zhing //
T02D1429:198b-44: dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang //
T02D1429:198b-45: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las //
T02D1429:198b-46: grol bar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi //
T02D1429:198b-47: rten sogs dge ba de dag gis //
T02D1429:198b-48: rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i //
T02D1429:199a-2: 'gro ba yongs su grol byed shog / de nas dngos po rnams yongs su bsal bar byas nas /
T02D1429:199a-3: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bha ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1429:199a-4: zhes bya bas dag par byas nas nye bar bsdus
T02D1429:199a-5: te n'a da tsam gyi ye shes la aom sh'u
T02D1429:199a-6: n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&
T02D1429:199a-7: ham zhes brjod pas byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D1429:199a-8: rdzogs pa'o // de las langs te yam las rlung
T02D1429:199a-9: gi dkyil 'khor sngon po zla ba bkas pa lta
T02D1429:199a-10: bu ba dan gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1429:199a-11: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po g-yung drung gis mtshan pa gru gsum pa'o //
T02D1429:199a-12: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1429:199a-13: de'i steng du lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po
T02D1429:199a-14: gru bzhi pa rdo rje rtse gsum bas mtshan pa'o
T02D1429:199a-15: // de'i steng du sum las ri rab chen po
T02D1429:199a-16: rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin las grub pa
T02D1429:199a-17: gru bzhi pa rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mtshan
T02D1429:199a-18: // pa'o // de'i steng du h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D1429:199a-19: de'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma ge sar gyi phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1429:199a-20: de'i dbus su a'a li k'a li la dag pa
T02D1429:199a-21: rnams a'a li k'a li'i rnam par bsdus la de
T02D1429:199a-22: gyur pa las nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzugs su
T02D1429:199a-23: bsams te / de'i bar du h'um las rdo rje
T02D1429:199a-24: rtse lnga pa h'um gis mtshan pa rdo rje sems
T02D1429:199a-25: dpa'i rang bzhin can bsam par bya'o //
T02D1429:199a-26: de'i 'od kyis dag pa dang mdag pa rnams bsdus
T02D1429:199a-27: te gyur pa las dpal he ru ka dkyil 'khor
T02D1429:199a-28: gyi 'khor lo dang bcas pas rdzogs par gyur te
T02D1429:199a-29: gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhi dang ldan
T02D1429:199a-30: pa / rdo rje rtse mo can dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa /
T02D1429:199a-31: ka ba sum cu rtsa gnyis sam brgyad kyis spras pa /
T02D1429:199a-32: dar dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang rnga yab dang /
T02D1429:199a-33: 'phan la sogs pas brgyan pa de'i phyi rol na
T02D1429:199a-34: rdo rje'i sa gzhi la dur khrod brgyad gnas pa
T02D1429:199a-35: ste / shar phyogs su drag tu gtum par mdung
T02D1429:199a-36: gis phug pa'i ro dang sh'ir sha ta la glang
T02D1429:199a-37: ste / po'i gdong dang / dbang bo dang /
T02D1429:199a-41: byang phyogs tshang tshing rnam par 'khrigs par byang chub kyi shing la gnod sbyin gdong dang /
T02D1429:199b-0: sprul gyis zos pa @199b pa dang /
T02D1429:199b-2: sprin gyi rgyal po ldog byed rnams gnas ba'o //
T02D1429:199b-3: nub phyogs 'ur 'ur 'bar bar mya ngan med pa'i shing la chu srin gyi gdong can dang /
T02D1429:199b-4: rul pa dang chu lha dang /
T02D1429:199b-8: lho phyogs mthug pa'i dur khrod du bsregs pa'i ro dang /
T02D1429:199b-9: tsu ta'i shing la me he'i gdong dang /
T02D1429:199b-10: gshin rje dang gshin rje'i tshogs dang /
T02D1429:199b-12: dbang ldan gyi mtshams ha har dgod par bgegs pa'i ro dang /
T02D1429:199b-13: n+ya gro dha'i shing la khyu mchog gi gdong dang dbang ldan dang /
T02D1429:199b-16: gang ba rnams kyis mdzes pa'o //
T02D1429:199b-17: me'i mtshams nags tshal phun sum tshogs par dum bur gyur pa'i ro dang /
T02D1429:199b-18: ka ranydza ka'i shing la ra'i gdong can dang /
T02D1429:199b-22: bgegs byed rnams kyis gang ba'o //
T02D1429:199b-23: bden bral gyi mtshams su mun pa mi bzad par byis pa shi ba'i ro dang /
T02D1429:199b-24: 'khri shing la yi dvags kyi gdong dang /
T02D1429:199b-25: srin po dang srin po'i tshogs dang rigs ldan dang /
T02D1429:199b-27: rlung du k'i li k'i li'i sgra sgrogs pa smyo ba'i ro dang /
T02D1429:199b-30: rlung lha dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D1429:199b-31: dung skyong dang sprin stug po rnams so //
T02D1429:199b-32: de ltar dur khrod chen po der lha brgyad dang gza' brgyad dang /
T02D1429:199b-33: mkha' 'gro ma chen mo brgyad dang /
T02D1429:199b-35: ri dang chu dang me dang sku gdung chen po brgyad dang /
T02D1429:199b-38: srin po dang smyo byed dang /
T02D1429:199b-42: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gang zhing khra dang /
T02D1429:199b-50: yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang gi snying po la bcom ldan 'das sku mdog sngon po //
T02D1429:199b-54: mnyam pa'i zhal sngon po dang dmar po dang /
T02D1429:200a-1: re re la yang spyan gsum pa /
T02D1429:200a-2: rdo rje dang thod pa'i dbu rgyan can ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis mdzes pa /
T02D1429:200a-6: phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa /
T02D1429:200a-7: brgya phyed pa'i mgo bo dang /
T02D1429:200a-9: phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud
T02D1429:200a-10: pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag gis
T02D1429:200a-11: rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1429:200a-12: gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1429:200a-13: g-yas pa'i lhag mas da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gug dang /
T02D1429:200a-15: g-yon ba rnams na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dang rdo rje zhags pa dang /
T02D1429:200a-17: zhabs g-yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa'o //
T02D1429:200a-18: rdo rje phag mo ni sku mdog dmar mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1429:200a-19: khrag la dgyes pa gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'i phyag gis 'khyud ba ;
T02D1429:200a-20: lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas dgyes pa /
T02D1429:200a-21: phyag rgya lnga dang thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan par gnas pa'o //
T02D1429:200a-22: shar du mkha' 'gro ma nag mo dang /
T02D1429:200a-23: byang du l'a ma ljang gu dang /
T02D1429:200a-24: nub du dum skyes ma dmar mo dang /
T02D1429:200a-25: lho ru gzugs can ma ser mo dang /
T02D1429:200a-26: mtshams su bum pa padma'i snod dang ldan pa /
T02D1429:200a-32: de ltar lha lnga'i bdag nyid dam /
T02D1429:200a-33: thung zhing sgeg pa'i sku rdo rje dang dril bu dang da ma ru dang /
T02D1429:200a-34: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa'i rang bzhin 'khor lo lha lnga dang bcas pa'am /
T02D1429:200a-35: bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor phyi nang gi 'khor lo gnyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1429:200a-37: ljang gu 'ug gdong dang khyi gdong dmar mo dang /
T02D1429:200a-41: gshin rje pho nya mo dang /
T02D1429:200a-42: gshin rje mche ba ma rnams gzugs gnyis ma'i rang bzhin can te /
T02D1429:200a-43: zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ma gri gug dang thod pa dang /
T02D1429:200a-45: kha tv'am ga bsnams ba zhabs g-yas brkyang bas ro mnan pa /
T02D1429:200a-47: mi mgo'i do shal can sgeg ba'i zhal dang 'jigs su rung par gnas pa'o //
T02D1429:200b-0: de ltar sprul pa'i @200b sku'i sgom pa la gnas te /
T02D1429:200b-1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1429:200b-2: he ru ka la sogs pa'i lha //
T02D1429:200b-3: rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1429:200b-4: lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba'i //
T02D1429:200b-5: rkang ba'i dkyil du bskyod byed rlung //
T02D1429:200b-6: gzhu yi dbyibs su yang dag gnas sum mdo'i gnas su me yi dngos //
T02D1429:200b-7: gru gsum 'bar bar yang dag gnas //
T02D1429:200b-8: lto bar chu ni zlum po ste //
T02D1429:200b-9: snying gar sa ni gru bzhi gnas //
T02D1429:200b-10: sgal tshigs dbyug pa'i ri rab nyid //
T02D1429:200b-11: rang gi yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D1429:200b-12: ga ba brgyad ni nye bar gnas //
T02D1429:200b-13: chu zheng kun tu mnyam pa yis gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags //
T02D1429:200b-14: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo yis //
T02D1429:200b-15: dkyil 'khor gsum ni nges par gsungs //
T02D1429:200b-16: pu dzny'a aom aa go r'a de m'a //
T02D1429:200b-17: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi //
T02D1429:200b-18: pre gri soo sun si ma ku //
T02D1429:200b-19: mtshogs ma pulli ma la yar //
T02D1429:200b-20: mi phyed rtsa ni so sen 'bab //
T02D1429:200b-21: rab gtum thod ba'i dum bu nyid //
T02D1429:200b-22: spyi gtsug dz'a landha ra ra ni //
T02D1429:200b-23: skra spu 'bab pa phra gzugs ma //
T02D1429:200b-24: keng rus gtum pa'i mig can ma //
T02D1429:200b-25: ao dyan rna ba g-yas pa'i stengs //
T02D1429:200b-26: pags dang dri ma brtse ba ma //
T02D1429:200b-27: keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma'o //
T02D1429:200b-28: lag pa'i steng na aar pu da //
T02D1429:200b-29: g-yon pa mar ni sha yi khams ;
T02D1429:200b-30: /'bab pa mche gtsigs sna chen ma //
T02D1429:200b-31: go d'a ba ri rna ba g-yon //
T02D1429:200b-32: thung du ma ni rgyu ma 'bab //
T02D1429:200b-33: lha dgra dang ni dpa' blo can //
T02D1429:200b-34: r'a me shva ra smin ma'i dbus //
T02D1429:200b-35: rus sbal skyes ma rus pa 'bab //
T02D1429:200b-36: 'od dpag med dang mi thung ma //
T02D1429:200b-37: lha mo'i mkhar ni mig gnyis la //
T02D1429:200b-38: sgom pa ma ni mkha' ma 'bab //
T02D1429:200b-40: dpung pa'i rtsa bar m'a la be //
T02D1429:200b-41: snying gi khams 'bab dbang ma ste //
T02D1429:200b-42: rdo rje sku dang shing grib ma //
T02D1429:200b-43: mkha' spyod nyid de thugs 'khor lo //
T02D1429:200b-44: k'a ma r'u ni mchan khung la //
T02D1429:200b-46: myu gu can dang sa srungs ma //
T02D1429:200b-47: nu ma gnyis la ao tre ste /
T02D1429:200b-48: mjug ma mkhris pa 'bab pa nyid //
T02D1429:200b-49: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02D1429:200b-50: tri sha ku ni lte bar te //
T02D1429:200b-51: ma mo'i rtsa ni blo ba 'bab //
T02D1429:200b-52: dpa' bo chen dang rlung shugs ma //
T02D1429:200b-53: sna yi rtse mor ko sa la //
T02D1429:200b-54: mtshan mo'i rtsa ni rgyu ma 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-2: ka ling ga ni kha la ste //
T02D1429:201a-3: bsil sbyin ma ni gnye ma 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-4: rab tu bzang dang sngo bsangs mo //
T02D1429:201a-5: mgrin pa'i gnas su lamb'a ka //
T02D1429:201a-6: tsha ba ma ni po ba 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-7: rdo rje 'od dang shin tu bzang //
T02D1429:201a-8: k'anytsi snying ga'i gnas su ste //
T02D1429:201a-9: gzhos ma'i rtsa ru dri chen 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-11: hi m'a la mi chu so ru //
T02D1429:201a-12: shin tu gzugs can mtshan ma 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-13: mig mi bzang dang bya rgod ma //
T02D1429:201a-14: gsung ste sa spyod bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1429:201a-15: mkha' 'gro mar ni shes par bya //
T02D1429:201a-16: pre ta pu ri mtshan ma la //
T02D1429:201a-19: 'khor lo'i shugs ma stobs po che //
T02D1429:201a-20: gri ha de ba bshang lam la //
T02D1429:201a-21: dpyi ma'i rtsa ni rnag 'bab la //
T02D1429:201a-22: rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma //
T02D1429:201a-23: soo r'ashta ste brla gnyis la //
T02D1429:201a-24: rgyu sbyin ma ni khrag 'bab ma //
T02D1429:201a-25: rta mgrin dang ni chang 'thung ma //
T02D1429:201a-26: gser gling byin pa gnyis la ste //
T02D1429:201a-27: sbyor bral ma ni rdul 'bab byed //
T02D1429:201a-28: mkha' snying 'khor lo'i go cha ma //
T02D1429:201a-29: rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra //
T02D1429:201a-30: sdug gu ma ni tshil bu 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-31: shin tu dpa' mo he ru ka //
T02D1429:201a-32: sindhu rkang pa'i bol nyid la //
T02D1429:201a-33: grub ma'i rtsa ni mchi ma 'bab //
T02D1429:201a-34: padma gar dbang stobs chen mo //
T02D1429:201a-35: ma ru rkang pa'i mthe bo ste //
T02D1429:201a-37: rnam snang 'khor los sgyur ba mo //
T02D1429:201a-38: ku lu t'a ni pus mo la //
T02D1429:201a-39: yid bzangs ma ni snabs skyed byed //
T02D1429:201a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' gtso chen mo //
T02D1429:201a-41: sku ste sa 'og spyod ma yi //
T02D1429:201a-42: mkha' 'gro dpa' bor shes par bya //
T02D1429:201a-43: lte ba'am snying ga'i rtsa bzhi ni //
T02D1429:201a-45: bde chen dgu yi bdag nyid bsam //
T02D1429:201a-46: phyag brgyad dam ni sgo brgyad du //
T02D1429:201a-47: las kyi rlung ma byed bdag gis //
T02D1429:201a-48: khva gdong gshin rje ma sogs brgyad //
T02D1429:201a-49: me long nang gi gzugs bzhin du //
T02D1429:201a-50: rang gi cha lugs brgyan pa'i tshul //
T02D1429:201a-51: ro yi gdan la legs par dgod //
T02D1429:201a-53: mdzes shing 'jigs pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1429:201a-54: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis //
T02D1429:201a-55: yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1429:201a-56: mtho ris mi yul sa 'og tu //
T02D1429:201a-57: skad cig gis ni sku nyid gyur //
T02D1429:201a-58: skad cig gis ni rnal 'byor bdag //
T02D1429:201b-0: skad cig sngags @201b dang phyag rgyar ldan //
T02D1429:201b-1: kun nas kun du skad cig ste //
T02D1429:201b-2: skad cig gis gsang sngags ldan no //
T02D1429:201b-4: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya w'ak tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1429:201b-5: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharma: badzra shuddho& ham: aom a'a: h'um /
T02D1429:201b-7: phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab bya /
T02D1429:201b-8: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i k'a ya w'ak
T02D1429:201b-9: tsitta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham
T02D1429:201b-10: / ye shes las byung 'od tshogs kyis //
T02D1429:201b-11: rkang pa nas ni gtsug tor mthar //
T02D1429:201b-12: lus kun rab tu gsal byas nas //
T02D1429:201b-13: khams gsum khyab par rab tu spro //
T02D1429:201b-14: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo sbyar //
T02D1429:201b-15: mthe bong rdo rjer brtan byas nas //
T02D1429:201b-16: dpral ba'i steng du rab gzhag ste //
T02D1429:201b-17: bskor zhing kun du bskor bar bya //
T02D1429:201b-18: rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta //
T02D1429:201b-19: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1429:201b-20: phyogs bcu khams na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D1429:201b-21: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / sngags dang phyag rgyar rab ldan pas //
T02D1429:201b-22: dgug sogs dam tshig ro mnyam bya //
T02D1429:201b-23: aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a: yo ga shuddho& ham //
T02D1429:201b-24: de nas sngags kyi mtshon cha dgod //
T02D1429:201b-25: snying gar aom ha'i rnam pa yis //
T02D1429:201b-26: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag dgod //
T02D1429:201b-27: gnyis pa dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1429:201b-28: mchog mar na ma hi nyid do //
T02D1429:201b-29: spyi gtsug sv'a h'a hu nyid ni //
T02D1429:201b-30: mgon po padma gar dbang rgyal //
T02D1429:201b-31: bzhi pa dpal ldan he ru ka //
T02D1429:201b-32: phrag pa la ni boo sha ta he //
T02D1429:201b-33: mig gnyis la ni h'um h'um ho //
T02D1429:201b-34: rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid ldan //
T02D1429:201b-35: drug pa rta mchog rgyal po nyid //
T02D1429:201b-36: phat ham tshigs kun mtshon pa'o //
T02D1429:201b-37: lte bar aom bam phag mo'i bdag / ham aom snying gar gsod byed ma //
T02D1429:201b-38: hrim mom kha la rmongs byed ma //
T02D1429:201b-39: dpral bar hrim hrim skyong byed nyid //
T02D1429:201b-40: h'um h'um spyi gtsug skrag byed ma //
T02D1429:201b-41: tshigs mtha' kun la phat phat te //
T02D1429:201b-42: gtum mo'i bdag nyid rnam par bsam //
T02D1429:201b-43: bdag tshogs kun gyis g-yo ba yi //
T02D1429:201b-44: go cha srung ba bla na med //
T02D1429:201b-45: lus las khams gsum kun bkang ste //
T02D1429:201b-46: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02D1429:201b-47: nam mkha'i gtos ni bkang byas la //
T02D1429:201b-48: 'dod pa lnga ni mnyes gyur nas //
T02D1429:201b-49: mgon po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D1429:201b-50: dbang bskur ba ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1429:201b-51: yid kyis gsol ba legs btab pas //
T02D1429:201b-52: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1429:202a-2: lha yi chu ni dag pa yin //
T02D1429:202a-3: de bzhin du ni sku khrus gsol //
T02D1429:202a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D1429:202a-5: de ltar sngags de brjod nas su //
T02D1429:202a-6: padma'i bum pas dbang bskur bsam //
T02D1429:202a-7: lha rnams lus la bsdus nas kyang //
T02D1429:202a-8: mchod sprin kun gyis yang dag mchod //
T02D1429:202a-9: sna tshogs bstod pas mngon bstod nas //
T02D1429:202a-10: bdud rtsi mchog la longs spyod bya //
T02D1429:202a-11: dpa' bos lha rnams gsal dmigs nas //
T02D1429:202a-12: chos kyi sku la nges par sbyar //
T02D1429:202a-13: dpa' bo lhan cig skyes dga'i dngos //
T02D1429:202a-14: dag pa chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1429:202a-15: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin //
T02D1429:202a-16: me long la sogs ye shes bzhi //
T02D1429:202a-18: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-19: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni l'a ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-20: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dum skyes ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-21: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-22: 'dun pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni rab tu gtum ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-23: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gtum pa'i mig go //
T02D1429:202a-24: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'od ldan ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-25: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni sna chen ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-26: dad pa'i dbang po ni brtan pa'i blo can ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-27: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni mi thung ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-28: dran pa'i dbang bo ni langka'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-29: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni shing grib ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-30: shes rab kyi dbang po ni sa srungs ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-31: dad pa'i stobs ni 'jigs byed chen mo'o //
T02D1429:202a-32: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni rlung gi shugs chen ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-33: dran pa'i stobs ni chang 'thung ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-34: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni sngo bsangs ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-35: shes rab kyi stobs ni shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02D1429:202a-36: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rta rna ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-37: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni bya gdong ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-38: dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o //
T02D1429:202a-39: shin tu sbyangs ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni khanda ro ha'o //
T02D1429:202a-40: chos rnam bar 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni shoonda ni'o //
T02D1429:202a-41: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-0: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni @202b shin tu dpa' mo'o //
T02D1429:202b-1: yang dag pa'i lta ba ni shin tu stobs chen ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-2: yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'khor los sgyur ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-3: yang dag pa'i ngag ni brtson 'grus chen mo'o //
T02D1429:202b-4: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni khva gdong ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-5: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-6: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-7: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-8: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1429:202b-9: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa ni gshin rje brtan ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-10: dge pa'i chos skyes ba rnams bsrung ba ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-11: mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-12: mi dge ba'i chos skye ba rnams spong ba ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02D1429:202b-13: de dag ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams gnyis su med pa rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1429:202b-14: a'a li k'a li mngon bsams nas //
T02D1429:202b-15: rnal 'byor chen po ngal bso ste //
T02D1429:202b-16: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1429:202b-17: lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas par bsgom //
T02D1429:202b-18: yi ge rnams kyi mchog gyur pa //
T02D1429:202b-19: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1429:202b-20: lha yi sku ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1429:202b-21: de ni gzugs las 'das pa ste //
T02D1429:202b-22: dngos po med pa'i sems nyid yin //
T02D1429:202b-23: sems nyid rtog pas mi bslang ngo //
T02D1429:202b-24: bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na //
T02D1429:202b-25: de las gzugs ni thob bar 'gyur //
T02D1429:202b-26: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1429:202b-27: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1429:202b-28: ru ni tshogs dang bral ba ste //
T02D1429:202b-29: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1429:202b-30: de ltar sku gsum sbyor ba yis //
T02D1429:202b-31: gnas byas dpa' bo de yis ni //
T02D1429:202b-32: yon tan thob ba gang yin pa //
T02D1429:202b-33: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru ;
T02D1429:202b-34: / kha ni brgya stong du ma yis //
T02D1429:202b-35: brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
T02D1429:202b-36: de nas sngags kyi dngos grub phyir //
T02D1429:202b-37: sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu brtsam //
T02D1429:202b-38: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam hum h'um
T02D1429:202b-39: phat d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a
T02D1429:202b-41: aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:202b-43: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:202b-45: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1429:202b-47: sdig kun las ni rnam grol zhing //
T02D1429:202b-48: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin //
T02D1429:202b-50: badzra d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:202b-51: aom grihna grihna badzra l'a ma ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-1: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya badzra khanda ro hi hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-2: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra r'a dza badzra r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-3: aom na mo bha ga ba te wi re sh'a ya badzra k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-4: aom ma h'a ka la pa aagni sam ni bh'a ya badzra au l'u k'a sye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-5: aom dza ta ma ku tot ka t'a ya badzra shva n'a sye hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-6: aom damshtv'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu
T02D1429:203a-7: kh'a ya badzra s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat
T02D1429:203a-8: / aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya ya ma d'a dh'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-9: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la
T02D1429:203a-10: kha tv'am ga dh'a ri ne badzra ya ma d'u
T02D1429:203a-12: aom by'a gh'a dzi n'am ba ra dha r'a ya badzra ya ma damshnyi ni hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-13: aom ma h'a dhumb'a na dha ka ra wa pu
T02D1429:203a-14: sh'a ya badzra ya ma ma th'a ni hum h'um
T02D1429:203a-15: phat / rang gi yum dang gnyis su med pa
T02D1429:203a-16: zhal bzhi dang rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags te bcu
T02D1429:203a-17: pa sbyin sreg dang bcas pas bzlas so //
T02D1429:203a-18: gzhan yang rgyas pa'i tshul la yang /
T02D1429:203a-19: aom ka ra ka ra badzra pra tsandi badzra khanda ka p'a la hum h'um phat /
T02D1429:203a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams aom dang hum
T02D1429:203a-21: h'um phat kyi bar chud pa phreng ba'i sngags dang
T02D1429:203a-22: / dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams 'brel bar bzlas so //
T02D1429:203a-25: sum sgril ni cho ga'i khyad par ro //
T02D1429:203a-26: thams cad du'am tshes bcu la //
T02D1429:203a-27: rang 'dod las la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1429:203a-28: dang po dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1429:203a-29: chang sogs longs spyod kyis mchod nas //
T02D1429:203a-30: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya rab bcings nas //
T02D1429:203a-31: skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yis //
T02D1429:203a-32: lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la //
T02D1429:203a-33: dpal chen khrag 'thung nas brtsams nas //
T02D1429:203a-34: dur khrod gnas kyi mthar thug par //
T02D1429:203a-35: mthon bo'i gnas su mchod par bya //
T02D1429:203a-36: skye bo dam pa kun 'dus la //
T02D1429:203a-37: bde ba thams cad dbul bar bya //
T02D1429:203a-38: der ni bza' ba rnams zos la //
T02D1429:203a-39: lhag ma snod gnyis gzhag par bya //
T02D1429:203a-40: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor bdag / de yis ma mo dga' bar 'gyur //
T02D1429:203a-41: de yis lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal //
T02D1429:203a-42: gang gis kyang ni 'phrog mi nus //
T02D1429:203a-43: skye bo dang ldan kun gyis mchod //
T02D1429:203a-44: he ru ka dpal dgyes gyur nas //
T02D1429:203a-45: spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab gsol //
T02D1429:203a-47: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n+ya: sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho:/
T02D1429:203a-48: lan gsum lnga yis bar du brjod //
T02D1429:203a-49: rdo rje thal mo gyen du phye //
T02D1429:203b-0: aom kha kha @203b kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D1429:203b-1: sarba yaksha rak'a sa bh'u ta /
T02D1429:203b-4: aa pa sma ra badzra d'a ka d'a ki n+y'a da ya /
T02D1429:203b-7: ma ma sarba siddhi pram yatstshantu /
T02D1429:203b-14: ma ma sarba karta ya sata su kham ba brid dha ye /
T02D1429:203b-15: sa ha yi k'a bha bantu hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1429:203b-16: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi autstshi shta bhaksha ka sv'a h'a /
T02D1429:203b-17: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma phul la /
T02D1429:203b-18: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02D1429:203b-19: des gsungs tshig kyang tshad ma mchog yin de //
T02D1429:203b-20: bden pa de dag gis ni lha mo rnams //
T02D1429:203b-21: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
T02D1429:203b-22: ces brjod la yig brgya pas brtan par bya ste
T02D1429:203b-23: / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dga' bas sems
T02D1429:203b-24: can rnams bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du yang
T02D1429:203b-26: bdag don 'gyur dang gzhan la rnam brtse bas //
T02D1429:203b-27: dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa yi //
T02D1429:203b-28: thabs dag cung zad bkod la tshul min pa //
T02D1429:203b-29: 'byung 'gyur nyes pa mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
T02D1429:203b-30: 'di yis bsod nams mtha' med sgrub gyur gang yin des //
T02D1429:203b-31: mtha' med sems can bde ba'i lam zhugs sangs rgyas
T02D1429:203b-32: shog / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D1429:203b-33: de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba ;
T02D1429:203b-34: slob dpon chen po rig pa'i brtul zhugs pa dpal d'a ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1429:203b-36: // / bangga la'i pandi ta ku m'a ra badzra dang /
